ppl email Manual Page

Name

ppl email - Set a contact’s email address

Synopsis

ppl email <contact> <email-address>

Description

Stores the given email address as the contact address of the specified contact. The <contact> parameter must correspond to the ID of an existing contact in the address book. No validation is performed against the <email> parameter, so go nuts.

Examples

ppl email jdoe jdoe@example.org
